reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the kids.
reviews.reviewText: I have a 5 and 7 year old that both received an iPad for Christmas last year to watch their own shows and to stop the constant fighting over the TV. The problem though is they are both absolutely Deaf when they push the play button. Volume has to be at Max all the time or “I can’t hear it” in the most innocent, yet whiney voice is heard repeatedly like a broken record.I bought these headphones because they are offered at a great price and seemed to be of decent quality. With this being a multi-pack, I figured if the kids break one, I’ll have a backup.These things are GREAT. Sound quality is okay but the noise cancelling is solid for what you get and it actually gave my wife and I a bit of peace and quiet. Worth every penny. Kids have had the same set for a few months now without issues. Weekly use, they been tossed around, stepped on, tug of war with the cord once, carried onto an airplane and they’re still working perfectly. I still have 4 brand new pairs for if/when one of them breaks but that may be a while because these are going strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, Comfortable, Affordable
reviews.reviewText: As a parent, I've been through so many pairs of headphones and earbuds that it can be frustrating. Earbuds from a discount store are so cheaply made, that they stop working in a few days, even for a careful adult. I came across this brand while looking for school grade headphones. I was shocked to find them in 5 packs, in beautiful colors besides just black. They sound amazing,so much that I bought two boxes of them. They fold for storage, are well made, and outlast the cheap headphones, and the more expensive headphones I've bought my children. I kept a pair for myself to use at my desk because they are so comfortable. I've got this brand bookmarked, because I've been so pleased with them. Can't recommend them enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a bargain when you compare them to other headphones of the same kind. You get 5 sets for 6 to 8 dollars per headphone set. Others are usually AT LEAST 10 but more like 15 or 20 and higher. They have good sound quality, are comfy and seem pretty sturdy! I donated 2 sets to my children's school and gave each of my kids a pair. So far no issues, months in! In fact I am back again to buy a 2nd set given the quality and price! Love the colors too. Give these a go even if you only need 1 or 2 pairs, you'll have extras and won't need to buy any new ones anytime soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: I bought these bc they’re so inexpensive. I have a four year old who tends to break headphones by pulling too hard on the cords. This is still true he broke one set a week after I bought it but for being $5 a piece these headphones work very well, are comfortable and are pretty sturdy. Will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE these.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these to have on hand. My granddaughter is the hardest thing on headphones I have ever seen in my life she can go through them like water. But these come in handy because there’s five of them in the box to come together so I highly recommend these and they last for a long time to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for kids
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pack for my children. The variety of colors was perfect. I love that they are kids size but not limited on volume like most headphones advertised for kids. I wish they were a little more noise canceling but overall happy with the purchase. As for size, the fit slightly big bit manageable on my 2 year old and also fit my 8 year old just fine too. I can wear them myself as well since they adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my class of kindergarten
reviews.reviewText: My students complained about the uncomfortable dollar store headphones the school provided, so I took a risk a purchased a set of these. I ended up buying more because the kids really like them. No complaints about fit or comfort and they fold up nicely. They're still going strong after a semester of daily use from a bunch of 5-year-olds. I've recommended them to colleagues who have also had success. Great headphones for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well then breaks
reviews.reviewText: These are really good for the price but after a few months half of them have broke. I ordered 2 packs and the white and purple and green ones have broke the only ones that have not broke yet are the blue.
